2458bool QListModeViewBase::doBatchedItemLayout(const QListViewLayoutInfo &info, int max)
2459{
2460 doStaticLayout(info);
2461 return batchStartRow > max; // returning true stops items layout
2462}
2463
2464QListViewItem QListModeViewBase::indexToListViewItem(const QModelIndex &index) const
2465{
2466 if (flowPositions.isEmpty()
2467 || segmentPositions.isEmpty()
2468 || index.row() >= flowPositions.size() - 1)
2469 return QListViewItem();
2470
2471 const int segment = qBinarySearch<int>(vec: segmentStartRows, item: index.row(),
2472 start: 0, end: segmentStartRows.size() - 1);
2473
2474
2475 QStyleOptionViewItem options;
2476 initViewItemOption(option: &options);
2477 options.rect.setSize(contentsSize);
2478 QSize size = (uniformItemSizes() && cachedItemSize().isValid())
2479 ? cachedItemSize() : itemSize(opt: options, idx: index);
2480 QSize cellSize = size;
2481
2482 QPoint pos;
2483 if (flow() == QListView::LeftToRight) {
2484 pos.setX(flowPositions.at(i: index.row()));
2485 pos.setY(segmentPositions.at(i: segment));
2486 } else { // TopToBottom
2487 pos.setY(flowPositions.at(i: index.row()));
2488 pos.setX(segmentPositions.at(i: segment));
2489 if (isWrapping()) { // make the items as wide as the segment
2490 int right = (segment + 1 >= segmentPositions.size()
2491 ? contentsSize.width()
2492 : segmentPositions.at(i: segment + 1));
2493 cellSize.setWidth(right - pos.x());
2494 } else { // make the items as wide as the viewport
2495 cellSize.setWidth(qMax(a: size.width(), b: viewport()->width() - 2 * spacing()));
2496 }
2497 }
2498
2499 if (dd->itemAlignment & Qt::AlignHorizontal_Mask) {
2500 size.setWidth(qMin(a: size.width(), b: cellSize.width()));
2501 if (dd->itemAlignment & Qt::AlignRight)
2502 pos.setX(pos.x() + cellSize.width() - size.width());
2503 if (dd->itemAlignment & Qt::AlignHCenter)
2504 pos.setX(pos.x() + (cellSize.width() - size.width()) / 2);
2505 } else {
2506 size.setWidth(cellSize.width());
2507 }
2508
2509 return QListViewItem(QRect(pos, size), index.row());
2510}
2511
2512QPoint QListModeViewBase::initStaticLayout(const QListViewLayoutInfo &info)
2513{
2514 int x, y;
2515 if (info.first == 0) {
2516 flowPositions.clear();
2517 segmentPositions.clear();
2518 segmentStartRows.clear();
2519 segmentExtents.clear();
2520 scrollValueMap.clear();
2521 x = info.bounds.left() + info.spacing;
2522 y = info.bounds.top() + info.spacing;
2523 segmentPositions.append(t: info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight ? y : x);
2524 segmentStartRows.append(t: 0);
2525 } else if (info.wrap) {
2526 if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight) {
2527 x = batchSavedPosition;
2528 y = segmentPositions.constLast();
2529 } else { // flow == QListView::TopToBottom
2530 x = segmentPositions.constLast();
2531 y = batchSavedPosition;
2532 }
2533 } else { // not first and not wrap
2534 if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight) {
2535 x = batchSavedPosition;
2536 y = info.bounds.top() + info.spacing;
2537 } else { // flow == QListView::TopToBottom
2538 x = info.bounds.left() + info.spacing;
2539 y = batchSavedPosition;
2540 }
2541 }
2542 return QPoint(x, y);
2543}
2544
2545/*!
2546 \internal
2547*/
2548void QListModeViewBase::doStaticLayout(const QListViewLayoutInfo &info)
2549{
2550 const bool useItemSize = !info.grid.isValid();
2551 const QPoint topLeft = initStaticLayout(info);
2552 QStyleOptionViewItem option;
2553 initViewItemOption(option: &option);
2554 option.rect = info.bounds;
2555 option.rect.adjust(dx1: info.spacing, dy1: info.spacing, dx2: -info.spacing, dy2: -info.spacing);
2556
2557 // The static layout data structures are as follows:
2558 // One vector contains the coordinate in the direction of layout flow.
2559 // Another vector contains the coordinates of the segments.
2560 // A third vector contains the index (model row) of the first item
2561 // of each segment.
2562
2563 int segStartPosition;
2564 int segEndPosition;
2565 int deltaFlowPosition;
2566 int deltaSegPosition;
2567 int deltaSegHint;
2568 int flowPosition;
2569 int segPosition;
2570
2571 if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight) {
2572 segStartPosition = info.bounds.left();
2573 segEndPosition = info.bounds.width();
2574 flowPosition = topLeft.x();
2575 segPosition = topLeft.y();
2576 deltaFlowPosition = info.grid.width(); // dx
2577 deltaSegPosition = useItemSize ? batchSavedDeltaSeg : info.grid.height(); // dy
2578 deltaSegHint = info.grid.height();
2579 } else { // flow == QListView::TopToBottom
2580 segStartPosition = info.bounds.top();
2581 segEndPosition = info.bounds.height();
2582 flowPosition = topLeft.y();
2583 segPosition = topLeft.x();
2584 deltaFlowPosition = info.grid.height(); // dy
2585 deltaSegPosition = useItemSize ? batchSavedDeltaSeg : info.grid.width(); // dx
2586 deltaSegHint = info.grid.width();
2587 }
2588
2589 for (int row = info.first; row <= info.last; ++row) {
2590 if (isHidden(row)) { // ###
2591 flowPositions.append(t: flowPosition);
2592 } else {
2593 // if we are not using a grid, we need to find the deltas
2594 if (useItemSize) {
2595 QSize hint = itemSize(opt: option, idx: modelIndex(row));
2596 if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight) {
2597 deltaFlowPosition = hint.width() + info.spacing;
2598 deltaSegHint = hint.height() + info.spacing;
2599 } else { // TopToBottom
2600 deltaFlowPosition = hint.height() + info.spacing;
2601 deltaSegHint = hint.width() + info.spacing;
2602 }
2603 }
2604 // create new segment
2605 if (info.wrap && (flowPosition + deltaFlowPosition >= segEndPosition)) {
2606 segmentExtents.append(t: flowPosition);
2607 flowPosition = info.spacing + segStartPosition;
2608 segPosition += info.spacing + deltaSegPosition;
2609 segmentPositions.append(t: segPosition);
2610 segmentStartRows.append(t: row);
2611 deltaSegPosition = 0;
2612 }
2613 // save the flow position of this item
2614 scrollValueMap.append(t: flowPositions.size());
2615 flowPositions.append(t: flowPosition);
2616 // prepare for the next item
2617 deltaSegPosition = qMax(a: deltaSegHint, b: deltaSegPosition);
2618 flowPosition += info.spacing + deltaFlowPosition;
2619 }
2620 }
2621 // used when laying out next batch
2622 batchSavedPosition = flowPosition;
2623 batchSavedDeltaSeg = deltaSegPosition;
2624 batchStartRow = info.last + 1;
2625 if (info.last == info.max)
2626 flowPosition -= info.spacing; // remove extra spacing
2627 // set the contents size
2628 QRect rect = info.bounds;
2629 if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight) {
2630 rect.setRight(segmentPositions.size() == 1 ? flowPosition : info.bounds.right());
2631 rect.setBottom(segPosition + deltaSegPosition);
2632 } else { // TopToBottom
2633 rect.setRight(segPosition + deltaSegPosition);
2634 rect.setBottom(segmentPositions.size() == 1 ? flowPosition : info.bounds.bottom());
2635 }
2636 contentsSize = QSize(rect.right(), rect.bottom());
2637 // if it is the last batch, save the end of the segments
2638 if (info.last == info.max) {
2639 segmentExtents.append(t: flowPosition);
2640 scrollValueMap.append(t: flowPositions.size());
2641 flowPositions.append(t: flowPosition);
2642 segmentPositions.append(t: info.wrap ? segPosition + deltaSegPosition : INT_MAX);
2643 }
2644 // if the new items are visible, update the viewport
2645 QRect changedRect(topLeft, rect.bottomRight());
2646 if (clipRect().intersects(r: changedRect))
2647 viewport()->update();
2648}
2649
2650/*!
2651 \internal
2652 Finds the set of items intersecting with \a area.
2653 In this function, itemsize is counted from topleft to the start of the next item.
2654*/
2655QList<QModelIndex> QListModeViewBase::intersectingSet(const QRect &area) const
2656{
2657 QList<QModelIndex> ret;
2658 int segStartPosition;
2659 int segEndPosition;
2660 int flowStartPosition;
2661 int flowEndPosition;
2662 if (flow() == QListView::LeftToRight) {
2663 segStartPosition = area.top();
2664 segEndPosition = area.bottom();
2665 flowStartPosition = area.left();
2666 flowEndPosition = area.right();
2667 } else {
2668 segStartPosition = area.left();
2669 segEndPosition = area.right();
2670 flowStartPosition = area.top();
2671 flowEndPosition = area.bottom();
2672 }
2673 if (segmentPositions.size() < 2 || flowPositions.isEmpty())
2674 return ret;
2675 // the last segment position is actually the edge of the last segment
2676 const int segLast = segmentPositions.size() - 2;
2677 int seg = qBinarySearch<int>(vec: segmentPositions, item: segStartPosition, start: 0, end: segLast + 1);
2678 for (; seg <= segLast && segmentPositions.at(i: seg) <= segEndPosition; ++seg) {
2679 int first = segmentStartRows.at(i: seg);
2680 int last = (seg < segLast ? segmentStartRows.at(i: seg + 1) : batchStartRow) - 1;
2681 if (segmentExtents.at(i: seg) < flowStartPosition)
2682 continue;
2683 int row = qBinarySearch<int>(vec: flowPositions, item: flowStartPosition, start: first, end: last);
2684 for (; row <= last && flowPositions.at(i: row) <= flowEndPosition; ++row) {
2685 if (isHidden(row))
2686 continue;
2687 QModelIndex index = modelIndex(row);
2688 if (index.isValid()) {
2689 if (flow() == QListView::LeftToRight || dd->itemAlignment == Qt::Alignment()) {
2690 ret += index;
2691 } else {
2692 const auto viewItem = indexToListViewItem(index);
2693 const int iw = viewItem.width();
2694 const int startPos = qMax(a: segStartPosition, b: segmentPositions.at(i: seg));
2695 const int endPos = qMin(a: segmentPositions.at(i: seg + 1), b: segEndPosition);
2696 if (endPos >= viewItem.x && startPos < viewItem.x + iw)
2697 ret += index;
2698 }
2699 }
2700#if 0 // for debugging
2701 else
2702 qWarning("intersectingSet: row %d was invalid", row);
2703#endif
2704 }
2705 }
2706 return ret;
2707}
2708
2709void QListModeViewBase::dataChanged(const QModelIndex &, const QModelIndex &)
2710{
2711 dd->doDelayedItemsLayout();
2712}
2713
2714
2715QRect QListModeViewBase::mapToViewport(const QRect &rect) const
2716{
2717 if (isWrapping())
2718 return rect;
2719 // If the listview is in "listbox-mode", the items are as wide as the view.
2720 // But we don't shrink the items.
2721 QRect result = rect;
2722 if (flow() == QListView::TopToBottom) {
2723 result.setLeft(spacing());
2724 result.setWidth(qMax(a: rect.width(), b: qMax(a: contentsSize.width(), b: viewport()->width()) - 2 * spacing()));
2725 } else { // LeftToRight
2726 result.setTop(spacing());
2727 result.setHeight(qMax(a: rect.height(), b: qMax(a: contentsSize.height(), b: viewport()->height()) - 2 * spacing()));
2728 }
2729 return result;
2730}
2731
2732int QListModeViewBase::perItemScrollingPageSteps(int length, int bounds, bool wrap) const
2733{
2734 QList<int> positions;
2735 if (wrap)
2736 positions = segmentPositions;
2737 else if (!flowPositions.isEmpty()) {
2738 positions.reserve(size: scrollValueMap.size());
2739 for (int itemShown : scrollValueMap)
2740 positions.append(t: flowPositions.at(i: itemShown));
2741 }
2742 if (positions.isEmpty() || bounds <= length)
2743 return positions.size();
2744 if (uniformItemSizes()) {
2745 for (int i = 1; i < positions.size(); ++i)
2746 if (positions.at(i) > 0)
2747 return length / positions.at(i);
2748 return 0; // all items had height 0
2749 }
2750 int pageSteps = 0;
2751 int steps = positions.size() - 1;
2752 int max = qMax(a: length, b: bounds);
2753 int min = qMin(a: length, b: bounds);
2754 int pos = min - (max - positions.constLast());
2755
2756 while (pos >= 0 && steps > 0) {
2757 pos -= (positions.at(i: steps) - positions.at(i: steps - 1));
2758 if (pos >= 0) //this item should be visible
2759 ++pageSteps;
2760 --steps;
2761 }
2762
2763 // at this point we know that positions has at least one entry
2764 return qMax(a: pageSteps, b: 1);
2765}
2766
2767int QListModeViewBase::perItemScrollToValue(int index, int scrollValue, int viewportSize,
2768 QAbstractItemView::ScrollHint hint,
2769 Qt::Orientation orientation, bool wrap, int itemExtent) const
2770{
2771 if (index < 0)
2772 return scrollValue;
2773
2774 itemExtent += spacing();
2775 QList<int> hiddenRows = dd->hiddenRowIds();
2776 std::sort(first: hiddenRows.begin(), last: hiddenRows.end());
2777 int hiddenRowsBefore = 0;
2778 for (int i = 0; i < hiddenRows.size() - 1; ++i)
2779 if (hiddenRows.at(i) > index + hiddenRowsBefore)
2780 break;
2781 else
2782 ++hiddenRowsBefore;
2783 if (!wrap) {
2784 int topIndex = index;
2785 const int bottomIndex = topIndex;
2786 const int bottomCoordinate = flowPositions.at(i: index + hiddenRowsBefore);
2787 while (topIndex > 0 &&
2788 (bottomCoordinate - flowPositions.at(i: topIndex + hiddenRowsBefore - 1) + itemExtent) <= (viewportSize)) {
2789 topIndex--;
2790 // will the next one be a hidden row -> skip
2791 while (hiddenRowsBefore > 0 && hiddenRows.at(i: hiddenRowsBefore - 1) >= topIndex + hiddenRowsBefore - 1)
2792 hiddenRowsBefore--;
2793 }
2794
2795 const int itemCount = bottomIndex - topIndex + 1;
2796 switch (hint) {
2797 case QAbstractItemView::PositionAtTop:
2798 return index;
2799 case QAbstractItemView::PositionAtBottom:
2800 return index - itemCount + 1;
2801 case QAbstractItemView::PositionAtCenter:
2802 return index - (itemCount / 2);
2803 default:
2804 break;
2805 }
2806 } else { // wrapping
2807 Qt::Orientation flowOrientation = (flow() == QListView::LeftToRight
2808 ? Qt::Horizontal : Qt::Vertical);
2809 if (flowOrientation == orientation) { // scrolling in the "flow" direction
2810 // ### wrapped scrolling in the flow direction
2811 return flowPositions.at(i: index + hiddenRowsBefore); // ### always pixel based for now
2812 } else if (!segmentStartRows.isEmpty()) { // we are scrolling in the "segment" direction
2813 int segment = qBinarySearch<int>(vec: segmentStartRows, item: index, start: 0, end: segmentStartRows.size() - 1);
2814 int leftSegment = segment;
2815 const int rightSegment = leftSegment;
2816 const int bottomCoordinate = segmentPositions.at(i: segment);
2817
2818 while (leftSegment > scrollValue &&
2819 (bottomCoordinate - segmentPositions.at(i: leftSegment-1) + itemExtent) <= (viewportSize)) {
2820 leftSegment--;
2821 }
2822
2823 const int segmentCount = rightSegment - leftSegment + 1;
2824 switch (hint) {
2825 case QAbstractItemView::PositionAtTop:
2826 return segment;
2827 case QAbstractItemView::PositionAtBottom:
2828 return segment - segmentCount + 1;
2829 case QAbstractItemView::PositionAtCenter:
2830 return segment - (segmentCount / 2);
2831 default:
2832 break;
2833 }
2834 }
2835 }
2836 return scrollValue;
2837}

2843 segmentStartRows.clear();

2881#if QT_CONFIG(draganddrop)
2882bool QIconModeViewBase::filterStartDrag(Qt::DropActions supportedActions)
2883{
2884 // This function does the same thing as in QAbstractItemView::startDrag(),
2885 // plus adding viewitems to the draggedItems list.
2886 // We need these items to draw the drag items
2887 QModelIndexList indexes = dd->selectionModel->selectedIndexes();
2888 if (indexes.size() > 0 ) {
2889 if (viewport()->acceptDrops()) {
2890 QModelIndexList::ConstIterator it = indexes.constBegin();
2891 for (; it != indexes.constEnd(); ++it)
2892 if (dd->model->flags(index: *it) & Qt::ItemIsDragEnabled
2893 && (*it).column() == dd->column)
2894 draggedItems.push_back(t: *it);
2895 }
2896
2897 QRect rect;
2898 QPixmap pixmap = dd->renderToPixmap(indexes, r: &rect);
2899 rect.adjust(dx1: horizontalOffset(), dy1: verticalOffset(), dx2: 0, dy2: 0);
2900 QDrag *drag = new QDrag(qq);
2901 drag->setMimeData(dd->model->mimeData(indexes));
2902 drag->setPixmap(pixmap);
2903 drag->setHotSpot(dd->pressedPosition - rect.topLeft());
2904 dd->dropEventMoved = false;
2905 Qt::DropAction action = drag->exec(supportedActions, defaultAction: dd->defaultDropAction);
2906 draggedItems.clear();
2907 // delete item, unless it has already been moved internally (see filterDropEvent)
2908 if (action == Qt::MoveAction && !dd->dropEventMoved) {
2909 if (dd->dragDropMode != QAbstractItemView::InternalMove || drag->target() == qq->viewport())
2910 dd->clearOrRemove();
2911 }
2912 dd->dropEventMoved = false;
2913 }
2914 return true;
2915}
2916
2917bool QIconModeViewBase::filterDropEvent(QDropEvent *e)
2918{
2919 if (e->source() != qq)
2920 return false;
2921
2922 const QSize contents = contentsSize;
2923 QPoint offset(horizontalOffset(), verticalOffset());
2924 QPoint end = e->position().toPoint() + offset;
2925 if (qq->acceptDrops()) {
2926 const Qt::ItemFlags dropableFlags = Qt::ItemIsDropEnabled|Qt::ItemIsEnabled;
2927 const QList<QModelIndex> &dropIndices = intersectingSet(area: QRect(end, QSize(1, 1)));
2928 for (const QModelIndex &index : dropIndices)
2929 if ((index.flags() & dropableFlags) == dropableFlags)
2930 return false;
2931 }
2932 QPoint start = dd->pressedPosition;
2933 QPoint delta = (dd->movement == QListView::Snap ? snapToGrid(pos: end) - snapToGrid(pos: start) : end - start);
2934 const QList<QModelIndex> indexes = dd->selectionModel->selectedIndexes();
2935 for (const auto &index : indexes) {
2936 QRect rect = dd->rectForIndex(index);
2937 viewport()->update(dd->mapToViewport(rect, extend: false));
2938 QPoint dest = rect.topLeft() + delta;
2939 if (qq->isRightToLeft())
2940 dest.setX(dd->flipX(x: dest.x()) - rect.width());
2941 moveItem(index: index.row(), dest);
2942 qq->update(index);
2943 }
2944 dd->stopAutoScroll();
2945 draggedItems.clear();
2946 dd->emitIndexesMoved(indexes);
2947 // do not delete item on internal move, see filterStartDrag()
2948 dd->dropEventMoved = true;
2949 e->accept(); // we have handled the event
2950 // if the size has not grown, we need to check if it has shrunk
2951 if (contentsSize != contents) {
2952 if ((contentsSize.width() <= contents.width()
2953 || contentsSize.height() <= contents.height())) {
2954 updateContentsSize();
2955 }
2956 dd->viewUpdateGeometries();
2957 }
2958 return true;
2959}
2960
2961bool QIconModeViewBase::filterDragLeaveEvent(QDragLeaveEvent *e)
2962{
2963 viewport()->update(draggedItemsRect()); // erase the area
2964 draggedItemsPos = QPoint(-1, -1); // don't draw the dragged items
2965 return QCommonListViewBase::filterDragLeaveEvent(e);
2966}
2967
2968bool QIconModeViewBase::filterDragMoveEvent(QDragMoveEvent *e)
2969{
2970 const bool wasAccepted = e->isAccepted();
2971
2972 // ignore by default
2973 e->ignore();
2974
2975 if (e->source() != qq || !dd->canDrop(event: e)) {
2976 // restore previous acceptance on failure
2977 e->setAccepted(wasAccepted);
2978 return false;
2979 }
2980
2981 // get old dragged items rect
2982 QRect itemsRect = this->itemsRect(indexes: draggedItems);
2983 viewport()->update(itemsRect.translated(p: draggedItemsDelta()));
2984 // update position
2985 draggedItemsPos = e->position().toPoint();
2986 // get new items rect
2987 viewport()->update(itemsRect.translated(p: draggedItemsDelta()));
2988 // set the item under the cursor to current
2989 QModelIndex index;
2990 if (movement() == QListView::Snap) {
2991 QRect rect(snapToGrid(pos: e->position().toPoint() + offset()), gridSize());
2992 const QList<QModelIndex> intersectVector = intersectingSet(area: rect);
2993 index = intersectVector.size() > 0 ? intersectVector.last() : QModelIndex();
2994 } else {
2995 index = qq->indexAt(p: e->position().toPoint());
2996 }
2997 // check if we allow drops here
2998 if (draggedItems.contains(t: index))
2999 e->accept(); // allow changing item position
3000 else if (dd->model->flags(index) & Qt::ItemIsDropEnabled)
3001 e->accept(); // allow dropping on dropenabled items
3002 else if (!index.isValid())
3003 e->accept(); // allow dropping in empty areas
3004
3005 // the event was treated. do autoscrolling
3006 if (dd->shouldAutoScroll(pos: e->position().toPoint()))
3007 dd->startAutoScroll();
3008 return true;
3009}
3010#endif // QT_CONFIG(draganddrop)

3069
3070void QIconModeViewBase::initBspTree(const QSize &contents)
3071{
3072 // remove all items from the tree
3073 int leafCount = tree.leafCount();
3074 for (int l = 0; l < leafCount; ++l)
3075 tree.leaf(i: l).clear();
3076 // we have to get the bounding rect of the items before we can initialize the tree
3077 QBspTree::Node::Type type = QBspTree::Node::Both; // 2D
3078 // simple heuristics to get better bsp
3079 if (contents.height() / contents.width() >= 3)
3080 type = QBspTree::Node::HorizontalPlane;
3081 else if (contents.width() / contents.height() >= 3)
3082 type = QBspTree::Node::VerticalPlane;
3083 // build tree for the bounding rect (not just the contents rect)
3084 tree.init(area: QRect(0, 0, contents.width(), contents.height()), type);
3085}
3086
3087QPoint QIconModeViewBase::initDynamicLayout(const QListViewLayoutInfo &info)
3088{
3089 int x, y;
3090 if (info.first == 0) {
3091 x = info.bounds.x() + info.spacing;
3092 y = info.bounds.y() + info.spacing;
3093 items.reserve(size: rowCount() - hiddenCount());
3094 } else {
3095 int idx = info.first - 1;
3096 while (idx > 0 && !items.at(i: idx).isValid())
3097 --idx;
3098 const QListViewItem &item = items.at(i: idx);
3099 x = item.x;
3100 y = item.y;
3101 if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight)
3102 x += (info.grid.isValid() ? info.grid.width() : item.w) + info.spacing;
3103 else
3104 y += (info.grid.isValid() ? info.grid.height() : item.h) + info.spacing;
3105 }
3106 return QPoint(x, y);
3107}
3108
3109/*!
3110 \internal
3111*/
3112void QIconModeViewBase::doDynamicLayout(const QListViewLayoutInfo &info)
3113{
3114 const bool useItemSize = !info.grid.isValid();
3115 const QPoint topLeft = initDynamicLayout(info);
3116
3117 int segStartPosition;
3118 int segEndPosition;
3119 int deltaFlowPosition;
3120 int deltaSegPosition;
3121 int deltaSegHint;
3122 int flowPosition;
3123 int segPosition;
3124
3125 if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight) {
3126 segStartPosition = info.bounds.left() + info.spacing;
3127 segEndPosition = info.bounds.right();
3128 deltaFlowPosition = info.grid.width(); // dx
3129 deltaSegPosition = (useItemSize ? batchSavedDeltaSeg : info.grid.height()); // dy
3130 deltaSegHint = info.grid.height();
3131 flowPosition = topLeft.x();
3132 segPosition = topLeft.y();
3133 } else { // flow == QListView::TopToBottom
3134 segStartPosition = info.bounds.top() + info.spacing;
3135 segEndPosition = info.bounds.bottom();
3136 deltaFlowPosition = info.grid.height(); // dy
3137 deltaSegPosition = (useItemSize ? batchSavedDeltaSeg : info.grid.width()); // dx
3138 deltaSegHint = info.grid.width();
3139 flowPosition = topLeft.y();
3140 segPosition = topLeft.x();
3141 }
3142
3143 if (moved.size() != items.size())
3144 moved.resize(size: items.size());
3145
3146 QRect rect(QPoint(), topLeft);
3147 QListViewItem *item = nullptr;
3148 Q_ASSERT(info.first <= info.last);
3149 for (int row = info.first; row <= info.last; ++row) {
3150 item = &items[row];
3151 if (isHidden(row)) {
3152 item->invalidate();
3153 } else {
3154 // if we are not using a grid, we need to find the deltas
3155 if (useItemSize) {
3156 if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight)
3157 deltaFlowPosition = item->w + info.spacing;
3158 else
3159 deltaFlowPosition = item->h + info.spacing;
3160 } else {
3161 item->w = qMin<int>(a: info.grid.width(), b: item->w);
3162 item->h = qMin<int>(a: info.grid.height(), b: item->h);
3163 }
3164
3165 // create new segment
3166 if (info.wrap
3167 && flowPosition + deltaFlowPosition > segEndPosition
3168 && flowPosition > segStartPosition) {
3169 flowPosition = segStartPosition;
3170 segPosition += deltaSegPosition;
3171 if (useItemSize)
3172 deltaSegPosition = 0;
3173 }
3174 // We must delay calculation of the seg adjustment, as this item
3175 // may have caused a wrap to occur
3176 if (useItemSize) {
3177 if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight)
3178 deltaSegHint = item->h + info.spacing;
3179 else
3180 deltaSegHint = item->w + info.spacing;
3181 deltaSegPosition = qMax(a: deltaSegPosition, b: deltaSegHint);
3182 }
3183
3184 // set the position of the item
3185 // ### idealy we should have some sort of alignment hint for the item
3186 // ### (normally that would be a point between the icon and the text)
3187 if (!moved.testBit(i: row)) {
3188 if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight) {
3189 if (useItemSize) {
3190 item->x = flowPosition;
3191 item->y = segPosition;
3192 } else { // use grid
3193 item->x = flowPosition + ((deltaFlowPosition - item->w) / 2);
3194 item->y = segPosition;
3195 }
3196 } else { // TopToBottom
3197 if (useItemSize) {
3198 item->y = flowPosition;
3199 item->x = segPosition;
3200 } else { // use grid
3201 item->y = flowPosition + ((deltaFlowPosition - item->h) / 2);
3202 item->x = segPosition;
3203 }
3204 }
3205 }
3206
3207 // let the contents contain the new item
3208 if (useItemSize)
3209 rect |= item->rect();
3210 else if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight)
3211 rect |= QRect(flowPosition, segPosition, deltaFlowPosition, deltaSegPosition);
3212 else // flow == TopToBottom
3213 rect |= QRect(segPosition, flowPosition, deltaSegPosition, deltaFlowPosition);
3214
3215 // prepare for next item
3216 flowPosition += deltaFlowPosition; // current position + item width + gap
3217 }
3218 }
3219 Q_ASSERT(item);
3220 batchSavedDeltaSeg = deltaSegPosition;
3221 batchStartRow = info.last + 1;
3222 bool done = (info.last >= rowCount() - 1);
3223 // resize the content area
3224 if (done || !info.bounds.contains(r: item->rect())) {
3225 contentsSize = rect.size();
3226 if (info.flow == QListView::LeftToRight)
3227 contentsSize.rheight() += info.spacing;
3228 else
3229 contentsSize.rwidth() += info.spacing;
3230 }
3231 if (rect.size().isEmpty())
3232 return;
3233 // resize tree
3234 int insertFrom = info.first;
3235 if (done || info.first == 0) {
3236 initBspTree(contents: rect.size());
3237 insertFrom = 0;
3238 }
3239 // insert items in tree
3240 for (int row = insertFrom; row <= info.last; ++row)
3241 tree.insertLeaf(r: items.at(i: row).rect(), i: row);
3242 // if the new items are visible, update the viewport
3243 QRect changedRect(topLeft, rect.bottomRight());
3244 if (clipRect().intersects(r: changedRect))
3245 viewport()->update();
3246}
3247
3248QList<QModelIndex> QIconModeViewBase::intersectingSet(const QRect &area) const
3249{
3250 QIconModeViewBase *that = const_cast<QIconModeViewBase*>(this);
3251 QBspTree::Data data(static_cast<void*>(that));
3252 QList<QModelIndex> res;
3253 that->interSectingVector = &res;
3254 that->tree.climbTree(rect: area, function: &QIconModeViewBase::addLeaf, data);
3255 that->interSectingVector = nullptr;
3256 return res;
3257}
3258
3259QRect QIconModeViewBase::itemsRect(const QList<QModelIndex> &indexes) const
3260{
3261 QRect rect;
3262 for (const auto &index : indexes)
3263 rect |= viewItemRect(item: indexToListViewItem(index));
3264 return rect;
3265}
3266
3267int QIconModeViewBase::itemIndex(const QListViewItem &item) const
3268{
3269 if (!item.isValid())
3270 return -1;
3271 int i = item.indexHint;
3272 if (i < items.size()) {
3273 if (items.at(i) == item)
3274 return i;
3275 } else {
3276 i = items.size() - 1;
3277 }
3278
3279 int j = i;
3280 int c = items.size();
3281 bool a = true;
3282 bool b = true;
3283
3284 while (a || b) {
3285 if (a) {
3286 if (items.at(i) == item) {
3287 items.at(i).indexHint = i;
3288 return i;
3289 }
3290 a = ++i < c;
3291 }
3292 if (b) {
3293 if (items.at(i: j) == item) {
3294 items.at(i: j).indexHint = j;
3295 return j;
3296 }
3297 b = --j > -1;
3298 }
3299 }
3300 return -1;
3301}
3302
3303void QIconModeViewBase::addLeaf(QList<int> &leaf, const QRect &area, uint visited,
3304 QBspTree::Data data)
3305{
3306 QListViewItem *vi;
3307 QIconModeViewBase *_this = static_cast<QIconModeViewBase *>(data.ptr);
3308 for (int i = 0; i < leaf.size(); ++i) {
3309 int idx = leaf.at(i);
3310 if (idx < 0 || idx >= _this->items.size())
3311 continue;
3312 vi = &_this->items[idx];
3313 Q_ASSERT(vi);
3314 if (vi->isValid() && vi->rect().intersects(r: area) && vi->visited != visited) {
3315 QModelIndex index = _this->dd->listViewItemToIndex(item: *vi);
3316 Q_ASSERT(index.isValid());
3317 _this->interSectingVector->append(t: index);
3318 vi->visited = visited;
3319 }
3320 }
3321}
3322
3323void QIconModeViewBase::moveItem(int index, const QPoint &dest)
3324{
3325 // does not impact on the bintree itself or the contents rect
3326 QListViewItem *item = &items[index];
3327 QRect rect = item->rect();
3328
3329 // move the item without removing it from the tree
3330 tree.removeLeaf(r: rect, i: index);
3331 item->move(position: dest);
3332 tree.insertLeaf(r: QRect(dest, rect.size()), i: index);
3333
3334 // resize the contents area
3335 contentsSize = (QRect(QPoint(0, 0), contentsSize)|QRect(dest, rect.size())).size();
3336
3337 // mark the item as moved
3338 if (moved.size() != items.size())
3339 moved.resize(size: items.size());
3340 moved.setBit(i: index, val: true);
3341}
3342
3343QPoint QIconModeViewBase::snapToGrid(const QPoint &pos) const
3344{
3345 int x = pos.x() - (pos.x() % gridSize().width());
3346 int y = pos.y() - (pos.y() % gridSize().height());
3347 return QPoint(x, y);
3348}
3349
3350QPoint QIconModeViewBase::draggedItemsDelta() const
3351{
3352 if (movement() == QListView::Snap) {
3353 QPoint snapdelta = QPoint((offset().x() % gridSize().width()),
3354 (offset().y() % gridSize().height()));
3355 return snapToGrid(pos: draggedItemsPos + snapdelta) - snapToGrid(pos: pressedPosition()) - snapdelta;
3356 }
3357 return draggedItemsPos - pressedPosition();
3358}
3359
3360QRect QIconModeViewBase::draggedItemsRect() const
3361{
3362 QRect rect = itemsRect(indexes: draggedItems);
3363 rect.translate(p: draggedItemsDelta());
3364 return rect;
3365}
3366
3367void QListViewPrivate::scrollElasticBandBy(int dx, int dy)
3368{
3369 if (dx > 0) // right
3370 elasticBand.moveRight(pos: elasticBand.right() + dx);
3371 else if (dx < 0) // left
3372 elasticBand.moveLeft(pos: elasticBand.left() - dx);
3373 if (dy > 0) // down
3374 elasticBand.moveBottom(pos: elasticBand.bottom() + dy);
3375 else if (dy < 0) // up
3376 elasticBand.moveTop(pos: elasticBand.top() - dy);
3377}

3441
3442int QListView::visualIndex(const QModelIndex &index) const
3443{
3444 Q_D(const QListView);
3445 d->executePostedLayout();
3446 QListViewItem itm = d->indexToListViewItem(index);
3447 int visualIndex = d->commonListView->itemIndex(item: itm);
3448 for (const auto &idx : std::as_const(t: d->hiddenRows)) {
3449 if (idx.row() <= index.row())
3450 --visualIndex;
3451 }
3452 return visualIndex;
3453}

3456/*!
3457 \since 5.2
3458 \reimp
3459*/
3460QSize QListView::viewportSizeHint() const
3461{
3462 Q_D(const QListView);
3463 // We don't have a nice simple size hint for invalid or wrapping list views.
3464 if (!d->model)
3465 return QAbstractItemView::viewportSizeHint();
3466 const int rc = d->model->rowCount();
3467 if (rc == 0 || isWrapping())
3468 return QAbstractItemView::viewportSizeHint();
3469
3470 QStyleOptionViewItem option;
3471 initViewItemOption(option: &option);
3472
3473 if (uniformItemSizes()) {
3474 QSize sz = d->cachedItemSize;
3475 if (!sz.isValid()) {
3476 QModelIndex idx = d->model->index(row: 0, column: d->column, parent: d->root);
3477 sz = d->itemSize(option, index: idx);
3478 }
3479 sz.setHeight(rc * sz.height());
3480 return sz;
3481 }
3482
3483 // Using AdjustToContents with a high number of rows will normally not make sense, so we limit
3484 // this to default 1000 (that is btw the default for QHeaderView::resizeContentsPrecision())
3485 // (By setting the property _q_resizeContentPrecision the user can however override this).
3486 int maximumRows = 1000;
3487 const QVariant userOverrideValue = property(name: "_q_resizeContentPrecision");
3488 if (userOverrideValue.isValid() && userOverrideValue.toInt() > 0) {
3489 maximumRows = userOverrideValue.toInt();
3490 }
3491 const int rowCount = qMin(a: rc, b: maximumRows);
3492
3493 int h = 0;
3494 int w = 0;
3495
3496 for (int row = 0; row < rowCount; ++row) {
3497 QModelIndex idx = d->model->index(row, column: d->column, parent: d->root);
3498 QSize itemSize = d->itemSize(option, index: idx);
3499 h += itemSize.height();
3500 w = qMax(a: w, b: itemSize.width());
3501 }
3502 return QSize(w, h);
3503}
